title: Assurance Associate

title: Product Researcher Intern

title: My Digital Academy Awardee
description: Designed a fintech prototype using Outsystem to improve children's financial literacy, applying key product principles such as user segmentation, wireframing, and MVP definition.

title: IT Platform Operation Intern

title: Cloud Computing Cohort

title: Information System Laboratory Assistant
